scripts.build: tsc && npm run lint && npm run test && webpack --config=webpack.config.js --env ${BUILD_ENV}
scripts.build:package: npm run build && npm run package
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:format
scripts.package: tfx extension create --root dist --manifests base.json --output-path dist/${BUILD_ENV}.vsix --publisher ${DEV_PUBLISHER}
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run package && npm run publish && npm run publish:environment-info && npm run publish:release-info && npm run publish:deployment-info
scripts.dev:environment-info: npm run build && npm run publish:environment-info
scripts.clean:publish:environment-info: npm run clean:task && npm run publish:environment-info
scripts.dev:release-info: npm run build && npm run publish:release-info
scripts.clean:publish:release-info: npm run clean:task && npm run publish:release-info
scripts.dev:deployment-info: npm run build && npm run publish:deployment-info
scripts.clean:publish:deployment-info: npm run clean:task && npm run publish:deployment-info
